articles.title: BTS's Jungkook Sweeps iTunes Charts All Over The World With “Never Let Go” - soompi
articles.description:
BTS’s Jungkook is dominating iTunes charts worldwide with his new fan song!

On June 7 at 1 p.m. KST, Jungkook released “Never Let Go,” a special tribute to his fans all over the world. Immediately upon its release, the song shot to the top of iTunes charts…
